channel.title: MyCloud on Lomorage
channel.description: Recent content in MyCloud on Lomorage

item.title: Simple and Fast Data Migration and Storage Expansion
item.description:
Simple and Fast Data Migration and Storage Expansion

Recently, a user encountered an issue where their original storage disk was full and wanted to directly migrate data from their existing PI server to a Windows server while expanding the storage disk. Let’s explore the fastest way to migrate and expand data, and this guide can also be used for data recovery. This article uses Windows as an example, but the process is similar for other platforms.

item.title: Set WD MyCloud as Lomorage redundancy backup disk on Windows
item.description: Setup WD MyCloud as Lomorage Redundancy backup disk on Windows.

item.title: Move MyCloud to Lomorage
item.description: I have ever bought one MyCloud 6T storage to save my photos and videos, but you know, the My Cloud app is not good to use, so everything I have to connect to my phone with USB cable, and keep the computer on to copy the files to MyCloud disk. Now let me introduce how to import / move MyCloud data to Lomorage.
